newsitem.title: USA: UnionAmerica stake held by FMR.
newsitem.headline: UnionAmerica stake held by FMR.

text.p: A group led by FMR Corp said in a Securities and Exchange Commission filing Monday it holds a 13 percent stake in UnionAmerica Holding Plc or 1,077,000 American Depositary Receipts.
The group disclosed its latest position on UnionAmercia in a 13G filing. FMR Corp is the parent to Fidelity Management & Research Co, investment adviser to Fidelity Funds.
Filings under 13G are usually made by institutions and large investors with "passive" investment objectives in a company. Unlike 13D filings, those reports do not list the latest transactions.
